Уникальные программы востановления и отд: Unique programs for relax and recovery
Рекомендуется прослушивать плейлисты по: It is recommended to listen to playlists for 30 minutes for at least 90 days
Регистрируясь, принимаю условия использо: By registering, I accept the terms of use and agree to the storage and processing of personal data
Для завершения регистрации введите код а: To complete registration, enter the activation code that was sent to your e-mail
На ваш e-mail было отправленно письмо с: Password was sent to your e-mail

Ваш уровень знакомства с классикой: Your level of familiarity with the classical music
Не слушаю и не понимаю, или слушаю редко: I do not listen and do not understand, or I listen rarely and little
Слушаю разную музыку разных эпох, разбир: I listen to different music from different eras, I understand them
Имею академическое музыкальное образован: I have an academic musical education
Хорошо разбираюсь в классической музыке,: I am well versed in classical music, I like to listen to complex music
Музыкотерапия - это: Music therapy is an effective method of correction of the psycho-emotional state. We recommend using the application for at least 15 minutes a day for 90 days for a stable effect.

consultations.label: Why do I need this app?
consultations.text: The Music Therapy app will be an important step on the way to yourself, to a harmonious and fulfilling life, it will bring more relaxation, enjoyment and new meanings to your days! Thanks to the app, you can reboot, relieve stress, and also get inspired by positive thoughts and emotions from specially selected music.

consultations.label: How does it work?
consultations.text:
There are 3 major sections: «Mediation», «Classics HD», «Live sound». 
            
            •	«Meditation» – synthesis of music, sounds of nature, psychological attitudes and natural landscapes to enter into states of joy, lightness and confidence, as well as improve your own well-being.
 •	"Classic HD" - scientists have repeatedly proven the positive effect that listening to classical music has on human condition and health. Masterpieces of popular classical music, combined with media effects, will take you on a journey into your inner world, bring a state of harmony and completeness to your life.
 •	"Live Sound" - information about "live" music therapy programs, where you can experience exposure to acoustic sound with all its healing overtones in a combination of classics and sound therapy instruments - Tibetan singing bowls, Kosha bells, chakraphones, sounds of nature and others!
 
 The combination of all these three variations has a beneficial effect on the entire body: both on the psyche and and on human physics, increases the effect several times.

consultations.label: How often should I listen?
consultations.text: We recommend listening to music for at least 15 minutes for 90 days. In this way, a stable effect can be achieved. But if your time is limited, even 5 minutes of using the application a day can qualitatively change your state and well-being.

consultations.label: Individual selection of playlists
consultations.text: This feature is not yet available.

consultations.label: Contact us
consultations.text:
To contact us, you can write to our mail info@musictherapy.by.
 More up-to-date information about our project in our Instagram https://www.instagram.com/music.therapy.by/.

consultations.label: When can I use application?
consultations.text:
Launch the app when you're taking a bath. If you're stuck in traffic, use this time to
 relax! Easy to use everywhere. Launch and enjoy the harmony!
